item.title: Review of 'Language Engineering; Harnessing the Power of Language (2004)'
item.description: This article is from 2004 or earlier. It’s still an interesting insight into perspectives on Language Engineering from the early 2000s. Original article Language Engineering; Harnessing the Power of Language The use of language is currently restricted. In the main, it is only used in direct communications between human beings and not in our interactions with the systems, services and appliances which we use every day of our lives.
